title: Remember When: Justin Bieber broke Aotearoa and we broke him
content:encoded:
It began with Justin Bieber's hat being stolen and ended with the popstar being doused in L&P and not knowing what German is. Join us as we remember when Biebermania hit Aotearoa during his chaotic 2010 press tour.


Join the Real Pod community!

Join The Real Pod Corner on Facebook

Join our Discord server
